attributes.action: replace all old traffic lights to new, modern LED traffic lights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LED traffic lights will help the environment because they use less electricity, and saves money for councils. Also, LED lights lasts for long, long, long time unlike old bulbs which eventually dies, disrupts road traffic and require an engineer to come and fix it - waste of money and time. All old traffic lights all over the United Kingdom needs replacing.
